abstract.t: This document defines a set of methods for Node-specific operationsas part of the REsource LOcation And Discovery (RELOAD) protocol.This document defines NodeFetch, NodeStore, and NodeRemove methodsthat allows manipuation of Node specific usage data. These methodswill be useful for multiple diagnostic, administrative, and discoveryusages. Because of their usefulness for a variety of expectedusages, these methods are advanced for inclusion in the base RELOADprotocol.
